message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $180 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $150, which is the maximum I'm comfortable with.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $180 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $165 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm sticking with my initial offer of $150. It's the absolute maximum I can pay.
I understand that you're sticking to your initial offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $160, but that's as low as I can go.
